column1: The Pit Room////One of your big challenges if you go when it's busy - Friday
column2: Saturday or Sunday for dinner - is parking. The Pit Room has a small parking lot. You can find street parking in front of the place
column3: or you can brave crossing Richmond Avenue to park on the other side of the street. And then if they're having a good day
column4: there may be a line to get in the door.
